content: I have a extended operation that has a String as one of its parameters. I used StringDt but get a ConfigurationException: "Incorrect use of type StringDt as parameter type for method when context is for version R4" From the OperationParameter code, the parameter type needs to be assignable from IDatatype (IDatatype.class.isAssignableFrom(theParameterType)) and it looks like StringDt fits that bill.
The string datatype for DSTU3+ in HAPI FHIR is called StringType instead of StringDt (this is just a result of the legacy development of the library.. the class works the same)
